Name: Star League Star Catalog
Details: The Star League Star Catalog (SLSC) was created by Ian Cameron after ascending to the throne of the Star League in 2571, in order to unify the different astronomical records used across human space and map all stars within the Inner Sphere and Periphery. Elaborated by the Star League Defense Force, with new versions released regularly, the SLSC became the standard for navigational and scientific proposes even if its last edition hasn't been updated in more than 250 years.
